mapper.sql: OS.ID, OS.BIANHAO, OS.MATERIALS_ID, OS.WAREHOUSE_ID, OS.OUTPUT_TYPE_ID, OS.STATE, OS.MONEY, OS.NUMBER_OF, OS.ENTRY_TIME, OS.UPDATE_TIME, OS.USER_ID, OS.AUDITOR, OS.RAW_NUMBER, OS.NOTE, MI.NAME, MI.COUNT, WH.WARNAME, OT.OPTNAME, SU.USERNAME
OS.ENTRY_TIME, OS.WAREHOUSE_ID, MI.ID, MI.NAME, MI.BIANHAO, MI.BAR_CODE, MI.STATE, MI.COUNT, WH.WARNAME
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM OS INNER JOIN MATERIALS_INFORMATION MI ON OS.MATERIALS_ID = MI.ID INNER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON OS.WAREHOUSE_ID = WH.ID INNER JOIN OUTPUT_TYPE OT ON OS.OUTPUT_TYPE_ID = OT.ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON OS.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID WHERE OS.ID=#{ID}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM OUTPUT_STORAGE WHERE MATERIALS_ID=#{ID};
mapper.update:
UPDATE
MATERIALS_ID=#{MATERIALS_ID},
WAREHOUSE_ID=#{WAREHOUSE_ID},
OUTPUT_TYPE_ID=#{OUTPUT_TYPE_ID},
STATE=#{STATE},
MONEY=#{MONEY},
NUMBER_OF=#{NUMBER_OF},
UPDATE_TIME=#{UPDATE_TIME},
NOTE=#{NOTE},
RAW_NUMBER=#{RAW_NUMBER},
AUDITOR=#{AUDITOR},
WHERE ID=#{ID}
